title: How to Put On a Breathe Right Strip

steps.title: Wash the surface of your nose using gentle, mild soap.
steps.content: Wash the surface of your nose using gentle, mild soap. Cleaning your nose thoroughly will help remove dirt and oil from your skin, and allow the strip to adhere to your nose more effectively. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Use a soft towel to gently pat your nose dry.
steps.content: Use a soft towel to gently pat your nose dry.

steps.title: Peel away the liner attached to the adhesive side of the Breathe Right nasal strip.
steps.content: Peel away the liner attached to the adhesive side of the Breathe Right nasal strip. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Place the strip adhesive-side down across the bridge of your nose.
steps.content: Place the strip adhesive-side down across the bridge of your nose. The strip should be positioned across the area located just above the flare of each nostril. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Press down on the ends of the strip gently to ensure that the adhesive strip sticks fully to your nose.
steps.content: Press down on the ends of the strip gently to ensure that the adhesive strip sticks fully to your nose. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Rub your fingers gently across the top of the strip to verify that the strip is secured to your nose.
steps.content: Rub your fingers gently across the top of the strip to verify that the strip is secured to your nose. [5] X Research source
